about_the_game:
Successor of the Key is a side-scrolling shooting game where you control a magical girl and seal off "the Spirit Tree" that erodes the world.

[[b]DEMO Ver.[/b]] You can play up to the second stage in the story mode.
detailed_description:
Successor of the Key is a side-scrolling shooting game where you control a magical girl and seal off "the Spirit Tree" that erodes the world.

[[b]DEMO Ver.[/b]] You can play up to the second stage in the story mode.
name: SUCCESSOR OF THE KEY Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Successor of the Key is a side-scrolling shooting game where you control a magical girl and seal off "the Spirit Tree" that erodes the world.[[b]DEMO Ver.[/b]] You can play up to the second stage in the story mode.
